creditline: Gift of Maymanah Farhat and Athir Shayota
inscription: Inscription within the composition at lower left: L | O | V | E | I searched | for the mountain | where I remembered | the rainbow: I did | not know it lay | now under | the Dark Star
medium: Watercolor with linoleum block print and collage on paper
provenance: The artist, San Francisco; [Farhat, San Francisco (private dealer)]; by descent to Maymanah Farhat, New York; given to MIA, 2019.
title: Love
